wiki.content: "Your Biggest Mistake" is the eighth track on Ellie Goulding's debut album Lights. She told Spinner UK that the song is about her dad, who left the family home when she was just five. "I don't really speak to him, and I think I got everything into that song that I could," she said. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
